objectId: id of the object to be displayed above each cell in the thumbnail mosaic.
each 'objectId' can have a different number of thumbnails (app will automatically adjust).
link: link to some other webpage related to the object.
for example link to a online database that has additional information (i.e., fink -- ztf.fink-portal.org).
thumbnailTypes: list of the type each thumbnail in 'thumbnails' represents.
displayed as tooltip in the application.
thumbnails: each cell defines a single pixel in an image.
the contained value in each cell defines it's brightness.
each thumbnail can have different dimensions (number of pixels) (app will adjust automatically).
$schema.$otherColumns: additional columns that shall be added to the downloaded csv file

object1.comment: exemplary entry in the data-file. note, the different shapes of the thumbnails. this is another comment.

object2.comment: exemplary entry in the data-file. this one has less thumbnails. this is another comment.
